info.author: Robert Escriva (rescrv)
info.description:
Scrutiny makes the job of grading much easier for educators and staff.

Scrutiny enables consistency in grading by separating concerns in grading; it
encourages modifying the rubric on-the-fly to fit non-cookie-cutter submissions
with ease.  The grading interface enables several individuals to act
consistently with respect to one-another.
